name: Grimlock
fluff: **Blindsight:** You have no eyes, and cannot be *blinded*. You can perceive your surroundings within 30 ft., or 10 ft. while *deafened*. You are considered blind beyond this radius.
**Keen Hearing and Smell:** You have advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.
**Stone Camouflage:** You have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.
**Languages:** You can speak, read, and write Undercommon.
